responsibilities: Process and structure large amounts of graph data to power applications across Atlassian.
Use generative AI and ML creatively to process, structure, and reason over large amounts of data to power intelligent products.
Mentor and coach team members on best practices, code quality, design patterns, testing, debugging, and documentation.
Communicate and explain data science concepts to diverse audiences and craft a compelling story.
Communicate effectively with internal and external partners, present technical concepts and results clearly and concisely, and solicit feedback and input from various stakeholders.
qualifications: Experience building and scaling business applications and systems using large amounts of data.
Ability to build generalizable platforms with a focus on empowering applications in product.
Agile development mindset, appreciating the benefit of iteration and improvement.
Experience working with LLMs and RAG (a bonus).
analysis: The job responsibilities include using generative AI and machine learning creatively to process, structure, and reason over large amounts of data to power intelligent products. This explicitly mentions the use of generative AI, which is a clear indicator that the job involves working with GenAI. Additionally, the skills section mentions experience working with LLMs and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) as a bonus, which directly relates to language models. Both the responsibilities and skills sections provide strong evidence that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
